animeTitle: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken: Kanwa - Veldora Nikki
animeDescription: Ifrit, who has been trapped in Rimuru due to the latter's Predator skill, recaps events of the season while in a discussion with Veldora as they play Shogi.
